title: An abstract of the grievances of trade which oppress our poor humbly offered to the Parliament.
author: Blanch, John, b. 1649 or 50.
notes: Attributed to John Blanch. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.); BM.
This item identified on film as Wing A135 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.); item reassigned Wing (2nd ed.) B3145B.
